Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Prairie
ShortDescription: Eastbound #47 buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Indiana, 43rd, King Drive, and 47th, due to construction near 47th/Prairie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Indiana, 43rd, King Drive, and 47th, due to construction near 47th/Prairie.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Washington/Wells
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Washington/Wells due to a police investigation. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Washington/Wells due to a police investigation.

As a result of the delayed train, Pink Line and Orange Line trains will be rerouted to the outer Loop (trains will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms at Washington/Wells, Quincy/Wells, LaSalle/Van Buren, State/Van Buren, Adams/Wabash, Washington/Wabash, State/Lake and Clark/Lake).

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These May include:

  • #J14 Jeffrey Jump
  • #20 Madison
  • #22 Clark
  • #36 Broadway
  • #56 Milwaukee
  • #60 Blue Island/26th
  • #62 Archer
  • #124 Navy Pier
  • Red Line, Blue Line and Green Line 'L' trains

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
